item.title: Episode 22: Reservoir Dogs
item.description: This week on Soundtracker I finally get to my first Tarantino movie, and I'm starting at the beginning. That's right, it's RESERVOIR DOGS, and I'm joined by Matt Christman (@cushbomb). In this episode, we talk about the weird way Tarantino's brain operates, call the Wet Bandits racists, and talk about the short but killer soundtrack... Feed: https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/1840875.rss?s=09

item.title: Episode 180: The Boycott
item.description: 15 years after the Supreme Court ruled that school segregation was unconstitutional in Brown v. Board of Education, many schools across the South were still segregated. Some school districts actively blocked desegregation. North Carolina passed legislation authorizing tuition grants to white private schools, sometimes called "segregation academies." Members of the KKK held rallies in North Carolina, describing desegregation as "anti-Christian" and "communistic... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/VMP7924981569
